schema.description: Webhook event for creating a new deal.

appId.description: The ID of your application. (In case you have multiple applications pointing to the same webhook URL.)

attemptNumber.description: Which attempt this is to notify your service of this event (starting at 0). If your service times-out or throws an error as described in 'Retries' below, we will attempt to send the notification to your service again.

changeSource.description: The source of this change. Can be any of the change sources that you find on contact property histories.

eventId.description: The unique ID of the event that triggered this notification.

objectId.description: The ID of the object that was created/changed/deleted. For contacts this is the vid; for companies, the companyId; and for deals the dealId.

portalId.description: The customer's portalId that this event came from.

subscriptionId.description: The ID of the subscription that caused us to send you a notification of this event.
